meanings.sent1: The humdrum task of washing dishes felt never-ending.
meanings.sent2: His humdrum life consisted of the same routine every day.
meanings.sent3: The humdrum weather made everyone feel sleepy.
meanings.sent4: The humdrum landscape stretched endlessly before us.
meanings.sent5: The humdrum gray sky matched his mood perfectly.

meanings.sent1: She found the humdrum office job uninteresting.
meanings.sent2: The humdrum sound of the clock ticking filled the room.
meanings.sent3: His humdrum jokes always made us smile.
meanings.sent4: The humdrum melody played on repeat in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The humdrum daily commute became unbearable over time.
